name: Tank Crew
description:
The Tank Driver needs to control the tank to reach its destination, but he does not have vision of his surroundings, so the Commander will need to give instructions to the driver player for them both to survive.

Game submission for : Multiplayer Game Jam

Attributions

Tank Logo by Vecteezy.

Attribution for the assets used in game can be found in the Atrributions.txt inside the game folder.
